plot: After the death of his mother, Jared visits his estranged father Darren and is forced to confront his memories of the last time they saw each other - 20 years ago.
title: Bodysurfer
plot_es: After the death of his mother, Jared visits his estranged father Darren and is forced to confront his memories of the last time they saw each other - 20 years ago.
plot_en: After the death of his mother, Jared visits his estranged father Darren and is forced to confront his memories of the last time they saw each other - 20 years ago.
